title.rendered: “IDF Airstrikes Target Hezbollah After UAV Downing: Latest Updates”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Fighter jets attacked terrorist targets overnight in response to rocket fire towards northern Israel and the downing of an IDF UAV operating in Lebanese airspace.

In response to the downing of an IDF UAV operating in Lebanese airspace by a surface-to-air missile from the terrorist organization Hezbollah, Air Force fighter jets struck a military compound used by Hezbollah in the Bekaa Valley.

Additionally, overnight, fighter jets attacked another military structure of the organization in the Bint Jbeil area in southern Lebanon, along with the organization’s headquarters in the Kana and Ra’shit areas in southern Lebanon.

Attached is footage from the attack on the compound in the Bekaa Valley: https://bit.ly/3X2DM4v

Attached is footage from the attacks: https://bit.ly/3X13oik
